participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and expressive, Amina finds joy in dance and cherishes her freedom.
participant_1.background: i like to dance. i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. my aunt helped me escape when i was of young adulthood. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and jovial, Jake thrives on social interactions and values his relationships.
participant_2.background: i am 24 years old. i love eating out with friends. i'm getting married in the spring. my favorite singer is taylor swift.
